definition: how?/how about?/how was it?/how are things?
suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc
not up to much/very indifferent/nothing great about it/nothing good to be said about it

sentences.english: How about tidying up a bit in the sitting-room ?
sentences.chinese: 把起居室稍微打扫一下怎么样？

sentences.english: What do you think about Union Square?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得联合广场怎么样？

sentences.english: What do you think about the two-party system in the United States?
sentences.chinese: 你认为美国的两党制怎么样？
来一块鱼肉三明治怎么样？

sentences.english: Well, it all looks so good. How about ordering the steamed prawns?
sentences.chinese: 这儿的菜看着都不错，我们要一份蒸虾怎么样？

sentences.english: But at each point you know how you're doing.
sentences.chinese: 但是在每个点上你知道你做得怎么样。

sentences.english: What about the other athletics events?
sentences.chinese: 其他的田径项目怎么样？

sentences.english: How about we go for hotpot dinner ?
Lady in the end how to be beautiful like?
sentences.chinese: 女人到底怎么样才算美丽？

sentences.english: What about motorcycle V. S. car oils ???
sentences.chinese: 摩托车和汽车机油对比怎么样？

sentences.english: But what if gender discrimination is in fact happening?
sentences.chinese: 但要是真的有性别歧视存在又会怎么样呢？

sentences.english: But what about bugs no bigger than the raindrops themselves?
sentences.chinese: 但是比雨点还小的小虫子们，它们的情况怎么样呢？

sentences.english: Your Homestay should also give you a map and tell you how to get to the college.
sentences.chinese: 寄宿家庭也会给你一张地图并告诉你怎么样去学校。

sentences.english: How to test the invitation code to get ah?
sentences.chinese: 怎么样才能获得测试的邀请码啊？

sentences.english: M: What do you think of the questionnaire report?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得这份问卷调查报告怎么样？

sentences.english: Yes I am a Prolem child, but what fuck can you do to me about?
sentences.chinese: 对，我是个问题儿童，但是你能那我怎么样？

definition: is or isn't/yes or no/whether or not
variant of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]
right or wrong?/Is it right?/OK, yes? (colloquial)
(before a noun) Do (you, they etc) have ...?/Is there a ...?/(before a verb) Did (you, they etc) (verb, infinitive)?/Have (you, they etc) (verb, past participle)?

particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
youngest/most junior/tiny/one (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers, esp. on telephone or in military)/one or ace on dice or dominoes/variant of 吆[yao1], to shout
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
(posing a question: whether sb, something) can or cannot?/is able to or not
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
